papers.title: Machine learning for healthcare: Predictive analytics
papers.abstract: We present a comprehensive review of machine learning applications in healthcare predictive analytics.

papers.title: Natural language processing in clinical text mining
papers.abstract: This study explores NLP techniques for extracting clinical information from unstructured medical records.
papers.assessment_notes: High-quality systematic review with clear methodology

papers.title: Deep learning for medical image analysis: A review
papers.journal: Journal of the American Medical Informatics Association
papers.abstract: A comprehensive survey of deep learning methods applied to medical imaging.
papers.assessment_notes: Out of scope - focuses on imaging rather than analytics

papers.title: Electronic health record data quality assessment framework
papers.abstract: We propose a standardized framework for assessing data quality in EHR systems.

papers.title: FHIR-based interoperability for healthcare analytics platforms
papers.journal: BMC Medical Informatics and Decision Making
papers.abstract: Implementation of FHIR standards for enabling healthcare data interoperability.
papers.assessment_notes: Excellent practical implementation with reproducible results
